mapper.insert: insert into comment (content, writer_id, post_id, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at) values (#{content}, ${writerId}, ${postId}, 0, now(), now())
mapper.select: select id, content, post_id, writer_id from comment where post_id = ${postId} and is_deleted = 0
mapper.delete: update comment set is_deleted = 1, updated_at = now() where id = ${commentId}
